none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on September 05, 2011 Description from Terminal Escape:
UK noise Oi! from WANKYS personel. Irreverent and undeniably catchy...if you aren't careful then you might find yourself in the middle of a one person pogo party in your kitchen screaming along with "Oi To Nori" as you prepare lunch. Not that this happened to me, I just want you to consider yourself warned.  POGO DISCHORD!!
//1.bp.blogspot.com/-7JAbuNyCV1c/TlckVXydAMI/AAAAAAAAB2g/TSRYr3Gj9BI/s1600/injections++cover+copy.jpg //1.bp.blogspot.com/-f0y4qPNmZWw/Tlclos21TII/AAAAAAAAB2k/e5ryBkehjPs/s1600/injections+spine+copy.jpg

seo.title: The Injections - Pogo Dischord demo 2010 - Terminal Escape
